races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Dwarf are small but stocky humanoid stone creature almost always bearded. They are a mining and smithing centric society with a monarchy.

races.name: Grawl
races.description: The Grawl are humanoid creatures. This species has an ape like physique and seems to possess a primitive form of culture with a social hierarchy and different professions.

races.name: Chaar
races.description: A savage race of sentient beasts, the Charr will use any means available to destroy their enemies: an ambush is as honorable as a fair fight, as victory is what matters. Though Charr have no concept of mercy, they can be protective of those within their tribe.
